CheckTitle: Ensure that 'Enable key rotation reminders' is enabled for each Storage Account
Description: Ensure that 'Enable key rotation reminders' is enabled for each Storage Account
Risk: TLS versions 1.0 and 1.1 are known to be susceptible to certain Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) weaknesses and attacks such as POODLE and BEAST

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that all your Microsoft Azure Storage accounts are using the latest available version of the TLS protocol.
